author.name: Tom Smith
author.description:
I grew up in a small town in northern Illinois, graduated from Columbia College Chicago, and produced TV news for network affiliates.

The TV news business was fun. But not the hours or many of the stories. And, I shifted to sales.  

But after many years I started getting fired a lot. Turns out old-school media companies don't like painful honesty and new ideas.  

Luckily, Al Gore invented the internet. So, I started iDSC. And cover whatever stories I want. ;0)
